container.spectrum.rei.freezing.title: Freezing
container.spectrum.bedrock_anvil.tooltip: repair cap & able to add Lore to Items
spectrum.rei.potion_workshop_reacting.mi:
• Creates Lingering Potions - also requires Gunpowder as reagent
• Allows you to create Tipped Arrows, if you supply Arrows instead of Bottles
spectrum.rei.potion_workshop_reacting.sp: • +60s duration

• +50% potency
• -75% duration
• -1 yield

• +1 potency for positive effects
• colors the potion in a random color
• 10% chance to add the main effect of the potion that was brewed before with +100% potency and duration
• +25% potency
• large boost to a random stat
• +120s duration for positive effects

• +1 potency
• +30s duration
• -2 yield
• converts negative effects to their positive ones
• +2 yield
• adds a very weird taste and smell to the potion, making it unidentifiable. Also colors it completely black
• +1 random positive effect
• -2 potency for negative effects
• +1 potency for negative effects
• negates the duration penalty for Lingering Potions as well as for Tipped Arrows

• +200% duration
• makes the Potion much slower to drink

• +20% potency
• +20% duration
• adds the main effect of the Potion that was brewed before, but with -25% potency
• 75% chance to add the main effect of the Potion that was brewed before
• dramatically increases potency at the beginning, but makes potency wear off over time - does not work for instant effects

• +1 potency
• +1 negative effect
• -1 yield

• +200% duration
• -25% potency
• makes effects not show any particles
• makes the potion much smoother, making it much quicker to drink
spectrum.rei.potion_workshop_reacting.bo:
• creates Lingering Potions & Tipped Arrows
• -25% potency

• +25% duration
• 15% chance to add last effect

• +3 potency
• -3 yield

Requires other reagents to increase the yield, otherwise you will end up with nothing...

• +2 positive effects
• +1 negative effect
• makes the potion unidentifiable.

Fancy a gamble?

• +3 positive effects
• 50% chance for negative effect
• makes the potion unidentifiable.

Fancy a gamble?

enchantment.spectrum.inventory_insertion: Puts broken blocks into your inventory

enchantment.spectrum.first_strike.desc: Increased damage if enemy has full health
enchantment.spectrum.improved_critical.d: Increased damage when dealing critical damage
enchantment.spectrum.inertia.desc: Decreased mining speed. Increases with each mined block of the same type

enchantment.spectrum.steadfast.desc: When on the ground, immune to most forms of damage, despawning and the void
enchantment.spectrum.big_catch.desc: Higher chance to reel in living creatures
enchantment.spectrum.crumbling.desc: Mining speed scales inversely with hardness.
enchantment.spectrum.inexorable.desc: Prevents tool and movement slowdown effects
enchantment.spectrum.razing.desc: Higher mining speed the harder a block is to break

advancements.spectrum.break_budding_bloc: Break a Budding Block using a Resonance Tool
advancements.spectrum.break_infested_blo: Break an Infested Block using a Resonance Tool
advancements.spectrum.break_spawner_with: Break a Mob Spawner using a Resonance Tool
advancements.spectrum.build_advanced_ped: Add new blocks to your Structure to make use of your improved Pedestal
advancements.spectrum.build_basic_pedest: To fully harness the powers of your improved Pigment Pedestal you will need to build a structure that funnels the energy from gemstones to it
advancements.spectrum.build_complex_pede: Upgrade your Pedestal Structure one last time to fully harness it's magical powers
Borrow some Moonstone Chiseled Blocks to expand your own Pedestal Structure
advancements.spectrum.carry_too_many_hea: Carry so much Stratine with you that you get unable to jump
advancements.spectrum.carry_too_many_low: Carry so much Paltaeria with you that you are taking flight
advancements.spectrum.catch_shooting_sta: Catch a Shooting Star right out of the sky
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_basic_: Collect all 12 kinds of colorful pigment
Mixing colors seemed so easy. But then brown had to ruin your fun. Literally impossible to mix using your current palette
Collect all types of naturally generating gemstones
advancements.spectrum.collect_azurite.de: Collect Raw Azurite. It has to be refined to be more useful
advancements.spectrum.collect_gemstone_p: Crafting in the Pigment Pedestal requires Gemstone Powder. What is the most straightforward way to crush something?
advancements.spectrum.collect_grayscale_: Complete your Pigment Collection by collecting the four grayscale Pigments
advancements.spectrum.collect_storm_ston: Discover the Source of Storm Stones
advancements.spectrum.collect_mermaids_g: What grows deep under the Sea?
advancements.spectrum.collect_pigment.de: Break the leaves of a Colored Tree to get the pure Pigment you so desired. The Leaves release their precious harvest only when broken by You personally
advancements.spectrum.craft_resonant_pic: Craft the Resonant Pickaxe. It's smooth vibrations seem to enable you to harvest a range of special blocks that were once unobtainable
advancements.spectrum.collect_stratine.d: Retrieve Stratine from the depths of the Nether
advancements.spectrum.collect_star_fragm: Gather the precious remnants of a Shooting Star
advancements.spectrum.collect_gemstone_s: Place a Crystal Apothecary in the center of a geode with fully grown Clusters
advancements.spectrum.collect_shimmersto: You never noticed this ore before at all.... weird. Is there more to the world than you previously thought?
advancements.spectrum.collect_vegetal.de: Place them food, lean back and watch them devour... then break them to harvest their drops
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_fa: Time to tinker with your new magical abilities. Create life! Or more like... microorganisms. Weak and slow. It's something. What do they eat?
Your first experiments were successful. But there has to be more...
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_ru: It looks like there is still more. Create world-devouring decay by infusing pure crystals with the power of the void
advancements.spectrum.craft_cmy_pedestal: Upgrade your Pigment Pedestal by using all your collected shards
advancements.spectrum.craft_colored_sapl: All around Me are Familiar Aces
Use your Magical Abilities to craft a colored sapling
advancements.spectrum.craft_moonstone_pe: Use a Moonstone Shard to upgrade your Pigment Pedestal once more
advancements.spectrum.craft_onyx_pedesta: Use the Onyx Shard to further enhance your Pigment Pedestal
advancements.spectrum.craft_something_br: The other Side of the Rainbow
Using Onyx Powder create something truly Brown in your improved Pigment Pedestal
advancements.spectrum.craft_using_pedest: Use your Pigment Pedestal to craft an item using Gemstone Powder. Trigger it with a Paintbrush or Redstone to start crafting
advancements.spectrum.fail_to_take_item_: Trigger it with a Paintbrush or Redstone to start crafting
Trigger it with a Paintbrush or Redstone to start crafting
Use the Fusion Shrine to create a black shard in the darkest of nights
advancements.spectrum.dark_radiance_staf: Change the light level of one of Radiance Staffs Lights to 1 by using the Staff on it
advancements.spectrum.use_oblivion_picka: Cut through the world using an Oblivion Pickaxe enchanted with Efficiency
advancements.spectrum.enter_dimension.de: Find out what lies beneath the once impenetrable Bedrock Floor
advancements.spectrum.fill_bottomless_bu: Completely fill up a Bottomless Bundle
Completely fill up a fully enchanted Bottomless Bundle by collecting 2000000000 items of one type
advancements.spectrum.get_semi_permeable: Craft semi-permeable glass to protect your home from intruders
advancements.spectrum.place_pedestal.des: Craft your personal Pigment Pedestal and place it down
advancements.spectrum.put_too_many_low_g: I must go, my planet needs me
Overload one of your animals with Paltaeria. Bye bye
advancements.spectrum.get_radiating_ende: Some Endermen that appear in your world carry blocks with them that seem to radiate an eerie aura
advancements.spectrum.spectrum.title: Spectrum - Start of a Journey
advancements.spectrum.spectrum.descripti: A story about magic, color and chaos
A story about a journeys end
advancements.spectrum.spectrum_midgame.d: A story about curiosity and greed
advancements.spectrum.use_all_pedestal_u: Place an Upgrade on top of each of the four Gemstone Blocks of your Pedestal Structure to improve its properties
I like to move it, move it
Socket a Perturbed Eye into an End Portal Frame and let destruction ensue
advancements.spectrum.plant_ominous_sapl: Let it grow, let it grow!
You're sure combining Vegetal with a Young sapling will yield something interesting
advancements.spectrum.collect_ender_drag: Collect the Ender Dragon's Head using a Weapon enchanted with Treasure Hunter
advancements.spectrum.collect_warden_hea: Collect the Warden's Head using a Weapon enchanted with Treasure Hunter
advancements.spectrum.collect_wither_hea: Collect a Wither Skull using a weapon enchanted with Treasure Hunter
advancements.spectrum.enter_liquid_cryst: What happens when you submerge yourself in the combination of all you have learned so far?
advancements.spectrum.gift_wet_lava_spon: Throw a Wet Lava Sponge at another player
advancements.spectrum.get_hit_while_wear: Get hit while wearing a full suit of Gemstone Armor
advancements.spectrum.collect_mob_head_u: Kill an Enemy with a Treasure Hunter enchanted Weapon and collect its Head
advancements.spectrum.build_wither_using: Build a Wither using Wither Skulls
advancements.spectrum.fill_knowledge_gem: Fill a Knowledge Gem with 10.000 Experience
Fill a fully enchanted Knowledge Gem with an uncountable amount of Experience
advancements.spectrum.enchant_exchanging: Create and enchant an Exchanging Staff
advancements.spectrum.gift_or_open_prese: Fill and wrap a present and place it down for someone you like to open - or open one yourself
advancements.spectrum.get_tool_with_iner: The fastest Pick in the West
Break 500 identical Blocks using an Inertia enchanted Tool
advancements.spectrum.revive_dead_bush.d: Use the Nature's Staff and Vegetal on a Dead Bush to bring it back to Life
advancements.spectrum.enchant_item_worth: Use the Enchanter to enchant a single Item with Enchantments worth 2500 XP
advancements.spectrum.create_resonance_e: Use the Enchanter to create a Book enchanted with Resonance
advancements.spectrum.upgrade_enchanted_: Use the Enchanter to upgrade an Enchanted Book with Fortune III to Fortune IV
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_de: Prep yourself with a Bottle of Decay Away, just in case anything goes horribly wrong
advancements.spectrum.enchant_book.title: Lossless Compression
advancements.spectrum.enchant_book.descr: Use the Enchanter to copy the Enchantments from one or more Enchanted Books to another. It will get pricey.
advancements.spectrum.craft_and_get_25_x: Craft a single Pedestal Recipe that rewards you with 25 XP
advancements.spectrum.create_midnight_ab: Fuse Topaz, Amethyst, Citrine, Onyx and Neolith
advancements.spectrum.collect_midnight_c: Get a Midnight Chip by using Midnight Solution
advancements.spectrum.finish_progression: Reach the end of your magical journey. Congratulations, Pigment Tinkerer!
Complete the Entirety of Spectrum without using any Hints. Wow! Enjoy your small Gift
advancements.spectrum.create_budding_ony: Create Budding Onyx in the Spirit Instiller. Seems like you are finally not relying on fusing them anymore!
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_shooti: Crouch-click on a Shooting Star to pick it up. Can you collect all variants?
advancements.spectrum.equip_neat_ring.de: Craft and equip an insanely expensive ring to assert dominance
advancements.spectrum.high_jump_with_tak: Charge up a Takeoff Belt to the maximum by sneaking. Then jump!
advancements.spectrum.take_off_belt_over: Charge up a Takeoff Belt too far and lose its charge
advancements.spectrum.kill_entity_with_j: Equip a Jeopardant and deal a killing blow while having only half a heart left
advancements.spectrum.get_azure_dike_cha: Charge up a Point of Azure Dike by equipping a Trinket made out of Azurite
advancements.spectrum.high_ink_use.title: A draining Experience
advancements.spectrum.high_ink_use.descr: Use a high amount of Ink with a single action
advancements.spectrum.fill_pigment_palet: Fill up your Pigment Palette with all types of Ink available
advancements.spectrum.equip_pigment_pale: Equip a Pigment Palette to easier store the essence of your magical powers. You can fill it with Ink to power your Staffs
advancements.spectrum.fill_ink_container: Use the Color Picker to fill an Ink container. Ink behaves similar to a gas, evening out between storages
advancements.spectrum.brew_potion_in_pot: Alchemy with a Touch of Magic
Use the Potion Workshop to brew a Potion. Add Reagents to add additional effects
advancements.spectrum.brew_powerful_poti: Combine Reagents in the Potion Workshop to brew a Potion with a level IV effect
advancements.spectrum.brew_lasting_potio: Combine Reagents in the Potion Workshop to brew a Potion that lasts 20 minutes or more
advancements.spectrum.brew_potion_with_f: Brew a Potion with 4 unique effects
advancements.spectrum.potion_mastery.des: Master the use of Reagents. You have unlocked an additional Reagent Slot!
advancements.spectrum.fill_potion_pendan: Infuse a Potion Pendant with an effect. Place it Potion Workshop as if you were to brew a Potion
advancements.spectrum.enchant_seven_leag: Enchant your Seven League Boots with Power to become even quicker
advancements.spectrum.craft_blacklisted_: Successfully fail to remember a Memory of a creature too powerful to be resurrected
Successfully remember a powerful creature as a Memory. You have been getting pretty good at this, haven't you?
advancements.spectrum.plant_jade_vines.d: Germinate a Jade Vine Bulb and plant it on the bottom of a Fence. Like all Vines, they grow downwards. Hidden away for aeons, sunlight is way too intense for your plant - they only grow when exposed to gentle moonlight
advancements.spectrum.harvest_moonstruck: Harvest Moonstruck Nectar by using a Glass Bottle on fully grown Jade Vines
Use a Bouncy Idol to create a Slime or Magma Cube of humongous size
advancements.spectrum.collect_hover_bloc: What happens when two worlds collide?
advancements.spectrum.wear_complete_set_: Black Knight of the roses, everlasting. Wear a full suit of Bedrock Armor
advancements.spectrum.place_color_picker: Craft and place down a Color Picker
advancements.spectrum.collect_bismuth_cr: Grow Bismuth into a full sized crystal and then break it. This iridescent material seems to collect energy from other nearby metal blocks
advancements.spectrum.grow_bismuth_in_cr: Grow a Bismuth Crystal using the Crystallarieum
Bump into Malachite on your way through the Deeper Down
advancements.spectrum.grow_malachite_in_: The growth of Malachite seems so slow, you will probably not be able to experience it in your lifetime. Is there an other way?
advancements.spectrum.build_cinderhearth: The book said 'it looks so much better WITH Lava', smartass
advancements.spectrum.smelt_in_cinderhea: Use a Production Surge and Light Blue Ink in the Cinderhearth for a chance to multiply your smelting output
advancements.spectrum.smelt_pure_resourc: The Cinderhearth seems to be immensely more efficient when smelting pure resource clusters compared to a mundane Blast Furnace
advancements.spectrum.collect_pure_resou: Collect a Pure Resource Cluster. These have a way more intense sheen than your basic ore scraps
advancements.spectrum.kill_entity_with_i: Kill a creature by using your Paintbrush's Ink Flinging ability. Sneak-Use to select a color.
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_mob_he: Collect each individual Mob Head & Skull. I really hope you have a big enough showroom
advancements.spectrum.fish_in_lava.title: Burning Desires
advancements.spectrum.hook_entity_with_m: Give someone a fish and they will eat for a day. Give them a Molten Rod, and they will set the world on fire
advancements.spectrum.fish_an_entity.tit: So long, and thanks for.. what
advancements.spectrum.fish_in_many_liqui: Fish in as many liquids as possible
advancements.spectrum.collect_amaranth_b: Grow Amaranth to completion and harvest it
advancements.spectrum.consume_purple_sta: Get a hold of and eat an Enchanted Star Cookie
advancements.spectrum.tap_titration_barr: Open up a Titration Barrel and tap yourself to a refreshing (or not so refreshing) drink
advancements.spectrum.tap_sweetened_jade: Looks - or rather tastes - like jade wine is much easier on the tongue when you add a drop of sweetness to it
advancements.spectrum.tap_pure_alcohol.d: Let a Titration Barrel ferment for so long the content turned into Pure Alcohol
advancements.spectrum.tap_aged_air.title: A whole Lot of Nothing
advancements.spectrum.tap_aged_air.descr: Tap a Titration Barrel sealed over multiple days with nothing inside
advancements.spectrum.tap_chrysocolla.de: Tap Jade Wine that has matured a little too long
advancements.spectrum.pluck_blood_orchid: They fear me, they fear me not
Create a Blood Orchid Plant and pluck it to get more Petals
advancements.spectrum.craft_salted_jaram: Bake with the Tears of your Enemies
advancements.spectrum.eat_each_pastry.de: Craft and eat all pastries there are
advancements.spectrum.remember_egg_layin: Hatch the Memory of an Egg Laying Wooly Pig
advancements.spectrum.have_half_a_heart_: Drink Freigeist, ascend and then reach only half a heart
advancements.spectrum.kill_a_mob_with_fr: Kill a mob while having the Frenzy III effect or higher. Instead of extending the duration, getting the effect a second time will upgrade it's level instead
advancements.spectrum.collect_gemstone_r: Get a hold of Gemstone colored Rock Candy
advancements.spectrum.apply_divinity.des: Drink Freigeist to get enormous buffs... at great cost, if you die
advancements.spectrum.drink_tea_with_sco: Drink Tea while having a Scone in your hotbar. Classy!
advancements.spectrum.survive_drinking_i: Survive the damage dealt to you when drinking Incandescent Amalgam
advancements.spectrum.place_incandescent: Incandescent Amalgam is a high yield explosive that is triggered by the slightest force of any kind and leaves behind a gigantic, burning crater. Good luck.
advancements.spectrum.trigger_unenchante: Disenchant a Workstaff and think about what you've done
advancements.spectrum.collect_mysterious: Find a Mysterious Locket in a Preservation Chest. What is it for? Who did it belong to? Why is it here?
advancements.spectrum.find_preservation_: In the underground you found a well-protected structure. There HAS to be a way to get into it! If not now, then later... better keep this place in mind.
advancements.spectrum.enter_wireless_red: Enter a Preservation Ruin protected by Bedrock
advancements.spectrum.solve_color_mixing: A structure guarded by a clever puzzle... no more
advancements.spectrum.solve_dike_gate_pr: A structure shielded by a mysterious protective field... no more
advancements.spectrum.solve_wireless_red: A structure protected by solid Bedrock... no more
advancements.spectrum.break_gemstone_ore: Mine Gemstone Ore. You found it right next to a Geode - a good indicator a Geode is close!
advancements.spectrum.collect_moonstone_: Find a Moonstone Core in one of the the Underground Cities
advancements.spectrum.create_malachite_t: Create a Tool made out of Malachite
advancements.spectrum.create_glass_crest: Socket a Malachite Tool with a Moonstone Core to unlock its active abilities
advancements.spectrum.shoot_fully_overch: Shoot a fully charged Glass Crest Crossbow
advancements.spectrum.collect_myceylon.d: Use an Axe to scrap the bark off of a Noxwood Mushroom
advancements.spectrum.collect_prickly_ba: Shear a Leaf off of a Prickly Bayleaf plant. They smell amazing in stews, but aren't too great to eat raw.
advancements.spectrum.create_pastel_netw: Create a Pastel Network by Linking two Pastel Nodes
Use each type of Pastel Node in a single Network
advancements.spectrum.create_big_pastel_: Create a giant Pastel Network spanning over 32 nodes
advancements.spectrum.visit_all_deeper_d: Visit each of the biomes in the Deeper Down
Try and fail to reinstate the age of divine dragons - and end up with something better!
advancements.spectrum.grow_bloodstone_in: ...for upon your hand sits the will of Wyrms of Yore - their drive for conquest and domination, crystallized. And upon it, witness your reflection
advancements.spectrum.pluck_effulgent_fe: §lOH GOD OH FUCK OH GOD OH FUCK OH GOD OH FUCK
advancements.spectrum.hurt_by_monstrosit: I hope you came prepared. Good luck
advancements.spectrum.collect_doombloom_: A howling fire, explosions, death. And a seed or two
advancements.spectrum.collect_dd_resourc: Collect all the various resources scattered around the Deeper Down
advancements.spectrum.collect_downstone_: Harvesting Downstone? The technology was definitely there
advancements.spectrum.start_crafting_tim: Remember that you can use Upgrades to speed up your lengthy crafting processes
advancements.spectrum.fail_to_glitch_int: Find out that you are not invited
advancements.spectrum.tame_lizard.title: Friend or Foe? Why not Both!
advancements.spectrum.spectrum_endgame.d: A story about all you have learned
advancements.spectrum.reached_dd_floor.d: Reach the Bottom of the Deeper Down
advancements.spectrum.open_mysterious_co: Socket a Moonstone Core into a Mysterious Locket and open it
advancements.spectrum.collect_enough_hin: Find out why the Deeper Down  is abandoned. Tinker will all sorts of stuff to find clues
advancements.spectrum.defeat_paintlich.d: Win a light-hearted discussion with an Aging Celebrity
advancements.spectrum.find_forsaken_cath: Find a run down Sacred Site
advancements.spectrum.no_rgb.title: Not Very Enlightening
advancements.spectrum.no_rgb.description: What exactly did you expect to happen? We are doing CMY here. Keep the RGB in your keyboard
advancements.spectrum.brew_no_potion_in_: Use so many potion reagents that reduce yield you end up with nothing
advancements.spectrum.fish_charged_creep: Fish up a charged Creeper. Sometimes everyone has their bad day
advancements.spectrum.crumble_midnight_a: Definitely not as 'perfect' as you anticipated it to be. Your 'perfect compound' quickly crumbled in your hands, item for item.
advancements.spectrum.collect_one_cookbo: How old could these be? Certainly, their writers are long, long gone
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_cookbo: To peer into this small collection is to peer into the vibrant cultures of peoples long gone. A reminder that they lived
advancements.spectrum.eat_each_cookbook_: Take a culinary tour of all the great meals in the underground cookbooks
advancements.spectrum.craft_energy_colle: Construct a collector powerful enough to harvest energy from a geodes
advancements.spectrum.place_energy_colle: Place the collector in the center of a geode and watch it work
advancements.spectrum.unused2.title: Having a Blast
